Text: ...Well then, if you could fill me in on the report.
Sir! Yes sir!

...There have been no significant movements from
Lady Karen.

Following your instructions, she's been wandering
around Alexandria, but there are no signs of any
internal reconnaissance.
I see... How does she usually spend her time?

Right. Lady Eta mostly has her tag along on her
experiments. I'm closely monitoring her to ensure
she doesn't lose her life during one of them.
Heheh... Classic Eta.

Once Lady Karen becomes our ally, Eta won't be able
to use her as a test subject so openly. That's why
she's putting her through the rounds now.
Lady Alpha?

Say, Lambda, was my approach to Lady Karen
the right one?

Looking back, it might not have been the best choice
to confront her with the Garden's interests and then
outright deny her way of life up to that point.

At the very least, I think there could have been a
better way to handle it.
Lady Alpha...

...If I may be so bold, I believe your actions at
that time were the right ones.

The Shadow Garden is an organization that ultimately
aims to destroy the Cult of Diablos.

Showing kindness and bending your iron will to
display compassion is unnecessary, even to pacify
the enemy. And besides—
Besides?
Lady Gamma is looking after Lady Karen.

The harsher your words, Lady Alpha, the more
effective Lady Gamma's gentle words sound.

So you're saying, for Lady Karen, Gamma and I are
like the carrot and stick.

As an aristocrat of the Velgalta Empire with a
fundamental understanding of reason, Lady
Karen should already know logically...
...that her current situation proves your words.

I guess it's part of a leader's responsibility to
play the role of a tough egg to crack.

If Lady Karen is unsure of how to cast off her past
self...

I must help her. Of course, in a way appropriate to
my position.
Faster... Peddle...faster!
Huff...huff...huff...huff!

Come on, faster... Pedal to the metal! Or it won't
generate power!
Wh-Why am I doing...such grueling work?!
Pedal...or you'll become a test subject!

How is this any different from already being a test
subject?!
Wha?! The machine is spewing fire!
Doesn't matter. Keep going.
It matters to me!
Don't worry about it—
Wh-What's this?! Hey, Eta!
Hmph... We've been interrupted...
What are you making our guest do? Stop this now!
Fine... Stop pedaling.
Huff...huff...
Are you okay, Lady Karen?
Y-Yes... I'm unharmed...
How about we step outside for some fresh air?
...Aren't you going to ask me anything?
What would you like me to ask?
Well...
...Why do you keep treating me as a guest?
That's because you are a guest, Lady Karen.

That's not what I'm asking. The fact remains that I'm
your enemy.

Yes, but you became possessed and lost everything.
Your status, honor, family, and your future...
Everything but your life.

While the Shadow Garden's objective is to destroy the
Cult of Diablos...

Rescuing and protecting the possessed is an equally
important mission.

...And what if I collect intel and bring it back to
the Cult?

If you planned to do that, you wouldn't be crazy
enough to go along with Eta's experiments, would
you?

With all due respect, Lady Karen, you seem to care
little for your own well-being.

On the other hand, you also want to transform
yourself.

That is why you've gone along with Eta's dangerous
invitations without a second thought...

When you get involved in her experiments, your desire
to survive naturally emerges...doesn't it?

...I'm speechless. You seem to know me better than I
know myself.
...I have no idea what I'm supposed to do.

I feel resentment and sadness over my fate and a
sense of retribution for the Herzog Family turning
a blind eye to reality.
But...more than anything, my heart just feels empty.

If you've come to that realization, then you can rise
again and start anew.
...You're quite articulate.

Well, I am a merchant, after all. I can be quite
convincing. And now, rather than trying to
convince you, I'll make you a proposal.
Lady Karen. You must live.
I must...live?!

You saved my life, so I ask you to witness how the
future of this world unfolds...and the pivotal role
that the Shadow Garden will play.
Witness, you say?

Yes, and to do that, you would be best served joining
the Shadow Garden.

Are you talking me into it by making it sound so
matter-of-fact?
Yes, exactly.
And it's not just a matter of fact. It's the truth.
Heh...
...It's true that I lost everything.

But there is still something that defines me which I
have yet to lose!

...I see. So that one thing is your skill with the
spear.

Yes. If I were ever defeated head-on in spear combat,
it would truly mean I have lost everything.

I am no longer the person I was when pursued by
Sergey. I am now in perfect condition...thanks to all
of you.

I thank you for that. And while accepting your
kindness, I also ask your forgiveness for pointing
my spear at you.
It's alright. Don't worry about it.

It seems this is your way to find and resurrect
yourself, and start anew.

But, Lady Karen...let me tell you the conclusion up
front.

If I defeat you, and you truly lose everything,
you'll pledge your loyalty to the Shadow Garden.
*gasp*

Former member of Velgata's Seven Blades.
Former First Child.

Now witness the spear of Karen the "Shooting Star"...
Witness the proof of my life!
